children.value: To secure a sensitive area such as a development area, you can share a cookie with trusted individuals and then filter requests so that only users with that cookie can access your site.
to target requests based on the presence of a specific cookie.
The first rule targets requests to dev.www.foo that have a specific cookie key,
. As long as the value of the cookie key contains one of three authorized users,
, the expression matches and the request is allowed.
The second rule blocks all access to
, Cloudflare grants access to requests that satisfy Rule 1 and blocks all other requests to

Execution order Expression Action
1 (http.cookie contains "devaccess=james" or http.cookie contains "devaccess=matt" or http.cookie contains "devaccess=michael") and http.host eq "dev.www.example.com") Allow
2 http.host eq "dev.www.example.com" Block
